(Whoa!  Whoa!  Whoa!  Strider...do you have some magical powers none of us 
are aware?  First off, your post started you off in the CF.  Heh, excuse me, 
but I'd like to say that is mass moding.  Unless there's a post I missed.  
How did your two characters get passed the shields, blast doors, EMP cannons, 
missile launchers, and autoguns?  

Then you seemed to have messed with cameras.  I'm sorry, but the cameras are 
all hidden and embedded in walls, you can't see them.  And there really isn't 
a place to hide so the cameras can't see you.  It'd be dumb to have cameras, 
but leave a nice big space where they can't see like a complete would do.

Next, you have codes to storage units?  Ummm...your character magically has 
these codes to open up storage units?  That's a little hard to believe.  
Next, you suddenly have plenty of equipment to carry all those fancy items 
out of the CF undetected?  Internal defenses would've taken you down long 
before you got out.  I'm going have to say your post doesn't add up, and this 
is something I would rather have Yanshosh to talk about before any action be 
taken.


Lord Unitron
KSLawDogg@...
